extendedInfo.description: Mazda keeps you moving forward with our new free Android app. Say hello to Mazda Assist, a new app designed to help get you movinâ again should you find yourself with a flat tire, out of gas, locked out of your car, or in need of a tow due to a mechanical failure. It puts you directly in touch with a roadside assistance agent who can quickly dispatch reliable and professional roadside assistance to your exact location via GPS-enabled technology, anytime. It even gives you the service providerâs E.T.A. and provides you updates throughout the roadside event.  Plus, it lets you input critical data about your Mazda: VIN â for more efficient service. And for added safety, Mazda Assist includes an emergency response button for urgent situations.  Rev up your peace of mind â download the free app today.

reviews.title: Can\'t verify 2014 CX-5 VIN
reviews.comment: It seems like the app has not caught up with the cars.  I can\'t verify my new 2014 CX-5 vin.
reviews.author: Dan Mitton

reviews.title: Mazda
reviews.comment: Wonderful presentation, fantastic,  awesome car!
reviews.author: Diane Sepulveda

reviews.title: Hard to find...
reviews.comment: The developer should put Mazda USA as the publisher. It was hard to tell that this the official application. Looks good but functionality is average.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ongoing Connection Error
reviews.comment: Never able to connect to verify the VIN.   Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Completely useless
reviews.comment: App can\'t connect to network to verify VIN or register. Double digit vin entry. Waste of space.  EVO 3D.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: The app looks good and is quick and reliable. The only drawback is the VIN entry can be glitchy with the Swype keyboard. It would be nice to see even more features in the future.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It does what it\'s supposed to do . . .
reviews.comment: and it\'s a handy little app to have in an emergency, but it\'s huge!  Over 10mb and I can\'t move it to my SD card.  I like it, but I\'m not yet convinced that it deserves that much space on my phone.  If the developer will fix these two problems, it\'ll get five stars for sure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app!
reviews.comment: Great app to have should you ever be in a situation that  should call for assistance. Real genuine Mazda app. Not some shoddily done 3rd party deal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t connect
reviews.comment: App won\'t connect to verify VIN number. Wondering if it will connect when I need roadside assistance?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I am attempting to input my VIN...it keeps doubling my letters and numbers. Annoyed already.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lg vortex
reviews.comment: Needs to have \"move to sd card\" option! 10 mb, is a lot of space for any phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sweet.....zoom..zoom
reviews.comment: awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfect for me
reviews.comment: Droid charge w/humble 5.0 rc2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mazda
reviews.comment: This app will only save part of my information and will not register for me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uhhhhh
reviews.comment: Vin double letters when you type it in. Peace guys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix problems
reviews.comment: Adds double letters when trying to enter vin
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems to work.
reviews.comment: Haven\'t had to use it \"for real\", but it seems to work ok.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Simple to use... and that is important when you need it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Could use support for multiple vehicles/VIN\'s and a section for comments. Planned to use this when at the parts dept.  Probs w/ vin entry on Echo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Clean interface, too large, needs to be able to move to SD card
reviews.author: A Google User
